question: Is it allowed to put hair products, or body spray while fasting? I was told by some people that putting anything on your body that can absorb while fasting is haram, is that true?
answer:
QUESTION

Salam

I had a few questions and was hoping you can answer them for me.

1) Is it allowed to put hair products, or body spray while fasting? I was told by some people that putting anything on your body that can absorb while fasting is haram, is that true?

Jazakallah for your time,

Salam.

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

It is permissible to use Halal hair products and body spray whilst fasting.

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

 

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
